name: ARUP
description:
ARUP is a party game conceived on the theme of Custom controller. In this game created for four, each player must just jump in order to avoid a cube moving faster and faster. Every player competes around a single objective:  being the last one alive. The particularity of ARUP is the way you play it: every player play on a single keyboard using each one a key to make their character jump: A, R, U and P. Watch out for your opponents and the different bonus you might get surprised. 

Controls : 

A, R, U, P : Jump, Space : Start a game, Escape: Restart the game
